name: Paired Tactician
originalText: Whenever Paired Tactician and at least one other Warrior attack, put a +1/+1 counter on Paired Tactician.

rulings.text: Paired Tactician gets just one +1/+1 counter from its ability, no matter how many Warriors attack with it beyond the first.
The other attacking Warrior doesn’t have to be attacking the same player or planeswalker as Paired Tactician.

text: Whenever Paired Tactician and at least one other Warrior attack, put a +1/+1 counter on Paired Tactician.
